title: Coconut Industry and Global Market Trends

questions.question: What is the approximate global coconut production per year?

choices: High-value products like virgin coconut oil
questions.answer: High-value products like virgin coconut oil

questions.question: Which of the following is a weakness in Timor-Leste's coconut industry?

choices: Climate change impacts on crop yields
questions.answer: Climate change impacts on crop yields

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a potential export product for Timor-Leste?

choices: Focusing solely on fresh coconut exports

choices: Focus on niche markets and organic products
Emphasis on processed coconut meat products
questions.answer: Focus on niche markets and organic products

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a major exporter of coconut products?

choices: Changing consumer preferences towards health products
Declining popularity of other vegetable oils
questions.answer: Changing consumer preferences towards health products

questions.question: Which sustainability issue is mentioned as a concern for the coconut industry?

choices: Lack of demand for coconut products
